title: The Ultimate Ramen!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Ooo….Kanata-san, amazing! The soup! The soup is invisible~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Nfufu~. Rin-chan, try it♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Slurp...slurp….Nn~~~!! It’s delicious-nya---!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yaay~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>There’s something that gives a fragrance to the clear and refreshing salty soup….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>I tried mixing dried sardines and Hamaguri clams for the broth~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Also also!  There’s a citrusy aroma in your nose when you smell it….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>That’s Pomelo~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Then the tender Chicken Char Siu with bamboo shoots, onion, spinach, seaweed!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>The Chicken Char Siu is also homemade~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Seconds please----!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
